## Block.setCommentText() method

Set this block's comment text.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCommentText(text: string | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | string \| null | The text, or null to delete. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
